title: Bitcoin OG Samson Mow: Nation State Bitcoin Adoption
description:
Samson Mow and Will Clemente, Lead Insights Analyst of Blockware Solutions discuss the Bitcoin bear market, Bitcoin nation state adoption, El Salvador, Tether FUD global macro, and more!
